data.title: The Fable Cottage: Bilingual stories for language learners
data.meta_description: Fairy tales and fables in Spanish, French, Italian, German and English. Lovingly crafted stories especially for children and adults learning a second language. Great for classroom and home study.
data.text:
text

audio

video

In this updated version of the story, Chicken Little reads a scary headline on the internet. It says: THE SKY IS FALLING. Of course, he read it on the internet... it must be true!

text

audio

video

A poignant original story about a bird and a whale who fall in love, in spite of their differences. But then the weather turns cold... Warning:Â This story has been known to make adults cry.

text

audio

A haughty swallow is flying to Egypt when he meets a regretful statue seeking redemption. A longer, intermediate-level story with sad parts.

text

audio

video

One day a hard-working hen sees a bush full of raspberries and decides to make a cake. Will her friends help? A harvest-tinged story with lots of repetition and baking vocabulary.

text

audio

video

Two hikers get stuck in some bad weather, and discover that a "useless" oak tree isn't so useless after all. A short story with weather and basic feelings vocabulary.

text

audio

video

Mr Bear is hungry for honey. Unfortunately he has no talent for negotiating with bees... A short, cautionary tale about losing your temper, told in the present tense.

text

audio

video

The wind and the sun want to find out who is the strongest, and so they throw a whole bunch of weather vocabulary at an unsuspecting man. Told in the present tense.

text

audio

video

A little girl stares out her bedroom window, longing for summer. Thenâ¦ she sees an ice cream truck. A short story inspired by âThe Spendthrift and the Swallowâ, told in the present tense.

text

audio

video

A city mouse tells wonderful tales of city life, but there are some things he neglects to mention... A short story in the present tense with a good moral for the Instagram generation.

text

audio

video

A dog finds a bone and feels like the luckiest dog in the world âuntil he sees another dog... A short story in the present tense with lots of question words and city vocabulary.

text

audio

video

Lion is getting ready for bed, when he hears a strange noise. What could it be? Is it a monster? The biggest, scariest monster EVER? A short story in the present tense.

text

audio

video

A hungry fox is walking through the forest one morning when he sees a crow with some cheese in his beak. But how can the fox get the cheese?Â A short story in the present tense.

text

audio

video

Once there was a girl with skin as white as snow who was more beautiful than the jealous queen. A story of magic mirrors, multiple dwarfs, poisoned apples, and ScrabbletM

text

audio

video

When a rich hat-maker tells people that his daughter can turn hay into gold, the king makes him prove it (or be fed to the crocodiles!) A story about family, fibbers, and golden underpants.

text

audio

video

A vain emperor loves bragging about his own intelligence. But when a dishonest tailor sells him some new clothes, he discovers who the real nincompoop is.

text

audio

video

A girl with long hair lives in a tower, with a witch as her only friend... until one night when she hears a strange voice down below. A story of resilience, herbs, heroes, and happily ever after.

text

audio

video

A well-meaning young man steals from giants â first because he wants his mother to be happy, but then he gets greedy... Will he becomeÂ âricher than the richest man in the worldâ?

text

audio

Cinderella is kind, intelligent, and loves to tell jokes. Will she go to the Kingâs ball? What will she wear? Will the prince laugh at her jokes? And what happens to the cat?
